headline: What You Need To Know Ahead of GE Vernova's Earnings Release
summary: GE Vernova is gearing up to announce its second-quarter results later this month, and analysts expect a triple-digit growth in earnings.

headline: GE Vernova Explores Sale of Proficy Software Division, Valued Up to $1B
summary: GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) is one of the best new stocks to buy now. On June 30, GE Vernova announced that it is exploring the sale of its industrial software division called Proficy. This potential divestiture could fetch between $900 million and $1 billion for the company, according to Bloomberg. The company is reaching out […]
